name: Necrofear
author: Khalid ヌール
notes: Got my first ever KoG using this deck which I copied from Depredates . The playstyle of this is a lot more aggressive than the Sphere Kuriboh varients and the 1 dark necrofear helps in a few situations too. Overall, a very solid deck.
main0: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
main1: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
main2: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
